title: The rehab area in excess of 20
clause_text: The rehab area in excess of 20.90 sq. m (225 sq. ft.) will be at construction cost to be determined by OSD, DRP/SRA and the said cost to be paid by the hutment dweller to the developer. Such area may be allowed on any side of the plot abutting at least
section: Commercial/Office/Shop/Industrial Structures/Structures for Potters Business Activity Free of Cost:

source_pdf.text_snippet: The rehab area in excess of 20.90 sq. m (225 sq. ft.) will be at construction cost to be determined by OSD, DRP/SRA and the said cost to be paid by the hutment dweller to the developer.
